thread.title: Kids learning code in Jersey | Channel
thread.title_full: Kids learning code in Jersey | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Kids learning code in Jersey | Channel
text:
Pupils at Les Landes School in St. Ouen are being taught how to code.
Coding is a process that creates computer software, apps and websites.
Barclays bank is helping to teach children how to code because a serious shortfall in coders is predicted for the near future.
1.3m The estimated shortfall of skilled coders by 2020. Pupils start by building a monster and progress to more complicated coding.
See them in action here.
Play video Last updated Mon 5 Oct 2015 Technology Jersey
